Interview Scheduling - [Your Company Name]

content:
Subject: Interview Scheduling - [Your Company Name]

Dear test@example.com,

Our team at [Your Company Name] is pleased to invite you to interview for the [Job Title - If known, otherwise omit this].

This interview will provide us with an opportunity to learn more about your qualifications and experience, and for you to learn more about the role and our company.

Please reply to this email with your availability for an interview within the next [Number] business days. We are available on [List a few specific dates and times, e.g., Tuesday afternoon, Wednesday morning, or Thursday all day]. Please let us know what works best for you.

We look forward to hearing from you soon and discussing this opportunity further.

Best regards,
HR Team - StaffPilot

Invitation to Next Round Interview - StaffPilot

content:
Subject: Invitation to Next Round Interview - StaffPilot

Dear Nishant Jaiswal,

We are pleased to inform you that you have been selected to proceed to the next round of interviews for the position you applied for at StaffPilot.

The recruitment team was impressed with your qualifications and experience. We believe your skills and background could be a valuable asset to our team.

Further details regarding the date, time, and format of the next interview round will be sent to you in a separate email within the next 24-48 hours. Please keep an eye on your inbox.

In the meantime, if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us.

We look forward to speaking with you again soon.

Best regards,
HR Team - StaffPilot
